name: Spirit's Crossing
description:
Spirit’s Crossing is a single player windows game with lyrical narrative elements. The player leads a spirit through a passage in order to reach a state of absolution. 

The spirit attempts to cross a threshold, amid assailing skulls and claws from beneath, seeking to deplete the spirit’s lifeforce. The player must avoid or activate quantum phase to bypass each threat. The spirit’s journey is narrated by an omnipotent guide.

Created by Connor Swannell and Jet Sweeney

Ludum Dare 46

Game Jam April 19th 2020
